title: Thumbnails: Max contrast, 3-5 words, 2-3 visual elements
content: Use 1280×720 (16:9). Keep text 3-5 impactful words in the title area. Use high contrast foreground/background and 2-3 visual elements total to avoid clutter; faces near rule-of-thirds with clear expression.

evidence.note: Higher CTR on simple, high-contrast comps

title: Prompting image generator for thumbnails (template)
content: Describe layout (left face, right big text), color palette, lighting, lens, background blur; include negative prompts for 'busy text', 'low contrast', 'small subject'. Export 1280×720, 72 DPI; keep safe title area.

title: Cohort definition by first transaction month
content: Assign each customer a cohort = month of their first transaction. Build retention matrix over months since first purchase. Use consistent calendar boundaries and UTC normalization.

title: CAC-adjusted LTV from retention and ARPU
content: Compute LTV = Σ_t (Ret_t × ARPU_t × margin)^t − CAC. Validate formulas (no #REF!, #DIV/0!). Provide sensitivity table for CAC and margin.

evidence.note: All green; reviewed on cohort model

title: Plan-Act (ReAct) with tool safety checkpoints
content: Before executing a tool, restate intended effect and expected outputs; after execution, validate outputs (schema/asserts). Roll back or branch on mismatch.
